name: AddUp Classic
description:
Unique and very Challenging Puzzle game

This is a unique and very challenging game based on existing game styles.

If you just want a casual yet challenging game to waste a few minutes then this is for you, It's fun, addictive and simple to play, and will keep you coming back for more.

Colourful graphics and simple gameplay, there is no timelimit but the faster you play the bigger the score.

When numbers have been removed from the grid, new numbers will fall in from the top. try and group them together for the bigger scores. Look out for bonus tiles ( multipliers and bonus points ) to push that score up.

How to Play

- Click on any group that has 3 or more blocks

- They will disappear just leaving the one you clicked on

- This block will then increase in value

- See if you can create a group of 9!

Features

- Simple, Fun and Addictive Gameplay

- Colourful Graphics

- Challenging yet casual gameplay
